Get all the advantages of %s with helpful features like setting your preferred funding source.
We\'ll use %s when you shop online or send money for goods or services.
We\'ll use %s when you shop online.

Setting PayPal Credit as your preferred way to pay online helps you check out even faster.



When PayPal Credit is set as your preferred way to pay, we\'ll use it automatically every time you check out. You can always choose a different way to pay any time at checkout.


PayPal Credit can\'t currently be used for Send Money transactions.


For more information, please read our User Agreement.

Are you sure you want to exit your application for PayPal Credit\?
The information you\'ve entered won\'t be saved if you exit.
Annual income after taxes
Provide your current income to make sure you don\'t miss out on possible credit limit increases.

You don\'t need to include maintenance, child support or separate maintenance income unless relied upon for credit. You may include the amount that you have available each year to spend from your assets.
credit self-reported income information
Review your current income to make sure it\'s accurate.
Save income

We review your credit limit and income periodically to see if you\'re eligible for a credit limit increase.

If you\'re checking out with PayPal Credit and don\'t have enough available credit to cover your purchase, we may evaluate your account for a credit limit increase. This process happens seamlessly during checkout and doesn\'t slow down the checkout process.
You\'ve updated your annual income after taxes.
